name: Burst Cherry Tomato Pasta
description: Make crave-worthy basil, garlic, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan pasta in minutes. This dish is a simple yet elegant way to celebrate spring flavours.
preparation:
1. Cook pasta in Multipurpose Pot according to package directions. Drain.  
  2. Meanwhile, heat oil in Saut√© Pan over medium heat. Add tomatoes. Cover and cook 7 min, until tomatoes soften, stirring occasionally. Using a spatula, crush tomatoes to release juice. Sprinkle in seasoning. Bring to a boil and let simmer 4 min.
  3. Add warm noodles to pan. Stir in spinach; cook until spinach is slightly wilted, about 1 min. Add toppings, if desired.
